titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the [Prairie 2000: Jens Jensen and the prairie garden sound recording collection]

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: [Prairie 2000: Jens Jensen and the prairie garden sound recording collection]

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [Oak Park, Ill.] : Pleasant Home Foundation, c1999.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Reflections on Jensen / by Leonard Eaton -- Jens Jenson : maker of natural parks and gardens / by Robert Grese -- Jensen in your neighborhood. Oak Park/River Forest / by Carol Yetkem. Lake Forest / by Arthur Miller. Highland Park / by David Wendell. Chicago parks / by Chris Gent -- Columbus Park memories / by Gloria Wexler -- Jens Jensen and the Friends of our Native Landscape / by William Tishler.
